front.title: IEEE Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage (1000 V ac and below, 3200 V dc and below) Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear - Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring
front.abstract: The requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
